name: INTRUDER - WAR AREAS
description: INTRUDER - WAR AREAS Do you like games that last for hours? Do you like games in which you can launch missiles, throw bombs and destroy things? Do you like stealth games? Then INTRUDER - WAR AREAS made for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: DualCore - 2,5 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX10.1 compatible with 1GB VRAM and ShaderModel 4.0 support DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Quadcore - 3,5 GHz Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX11.1 compatible with 4GB VRAM and ShaderModel 5.0 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
